question: The World Doping Agency has banned which country from all major sporting events?
explanation: The World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA) banned Russia for a four-year term from all major sporting events. The decision was made at Wada\'s executive committee in a meeting in Lausanne, Switzerland. Under the ban, the Russian national flag and anthem will not be allowed at events such as the Tokyo 2020 Olympics and Paralympics and football\'s 2022 World Cup in Qatar.
